about_the_game:
From world builder Iso, creator of the acclaimed Crystal Isles map (ARK: Survival Evolved), comes a brand new standalone ATLAS experience: Blackwood! Blackwood condenses the world of ATLAS into a single 1x1 server grid spanning 230 km and 11 islands. Witness stunning vistas, encounter all new discoveries, and conquer challenging trials; be it on your own or together with friends. Whether you’re looking to experience ATLAS on a much smaller scale or simply want to fly your colors in a unique environment, Blackwood offers a fresh new way to set sail for adventure!

Blackwood is free for anyone who already owns ATLAS. It is only available for play in Singleplayer mode, Non-Dedicated Server mode, and on Unofficial Servers that choose to host the map.


Blackwood includes:
  • The full ATLAS experience (including all your favorite features and mechanics) merged into a single 1x1 server grid.
  • 7 unique biomes across 11 islands, from hazy bogs teeming with life to mysterious jungles full of danger and toil.
  • Resource-rich islands complete with every material from the core game.
  • New cities and outlying areas ideal for roleplaying and server events.
  • A beautiful mermaid city ripe for exploration.
  • A new arena featuring unpredictable enemy types and spawn locations.
  • The Forbidden Reach: a hard mode island featuring elemental beings.
  • Other iconic ATLAS content, such as Army of the Damned mobs, all 9 Power Stone locations, the Fountain of Youth, your favorite tameable creatures, and much more...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for multiplayer

short_description: Set a course for Blackwood and experience the full world of ATLAS (with all your favorite features) in this official 1x1-sized custom map. Discover beautiful islands and intense challenges in this brand new way to enjoy the game.
